The reason for this is that Glycerol is believed to react with amines in the Tryptone/Yeast extract via the Malliard reaction, leading to the formation of compounds which ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
